name: PAT_ENC_QUESR
description: This table contains the questionnaire data for all patient encounters.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: QUEST_ANSWER
columns.description: The answer to a questionnaire question.

columns.name: QUEST_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment added to a questionnaire question.
